reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Kleinprojektefonds zur Verbesserung der Impfsituation gegen Covid-19, Phase 1
Small project fund to improve the vaccination situation against Covid-19, Phase 1

description.narrative: Das Projekt trägt zur Verbesserung des Zugangs zu und der Akzeptanz von Covid-19 Impfungen bei und ermöglicht eine an die Bedarfe der Partner angepasste Reaktion u.a. durch Austattung, Information und Weiterbildung zu COVID-19 Impfungen und Sensibilisierungen der Bevölkerung.

The project contributes to improving access to and acceptance of Covid-19 vaccinations and facilitates a response adapted to partners' needs through, among other things, equipment, information and training on COVID-19 vaccinations, and awareness-raising among the population.

The project contributes to improving access to and acceptance of Covid-19 vaccinations and facilitates a response adapted to partners' needs through, among other things, equipment, information and training on COVID-19 vaccinations, and awareness-raising among the population.
